statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT training_program, certification FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE certification = 'Certified';
SELECT employee_id, skill_development_progress FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE training_program = 'Leadership Training';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT training_program, certification FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE certification IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT training_program FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE skill_development_progress = 'In Progress';
SELECT employee_id, training_program FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(employee_id) AS avg_employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, end_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE program_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, program_name, start_date FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, program_name, COUNT(*) FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms GROUP BY employee_id, program_name;
SELECT employee_id, program_name FROM EmployeeTrainingPrograms UNION SELECT employee_id, skill_name FROM EmployeeSkills;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, skill_name, skill_level FROM employee_skill_development WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY skill_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_training_programs INNER JOIN employee_certifications ON employee_training_programs.program_id = employee_certifications.certification_id WHERE employee_certifications.employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM employee_skill_development WHERE skill_level >= 3 ORDER BY skill_level DESC, skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT department, employee_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_body FROM certifications LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_name, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_skills ON employees.employee_id = employee_skills.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT name, email FROM employees ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT department FROM employees WHERE id > 3
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT id, name, email FROM employees ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC, email ASC
SELECT id, name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND email LIKE '%@company.com'
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE id > 100 OR department = 'HR'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR (department = 'IT' AND email LIKE '%@company.com')
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR department = 'Finance'
